articles.title: Sydney Covid-19 cases seen topping 2000 a day as Australia ramps up vaccinations - TODAYonline
articles.description: SYDNEY — Sydney, the epicentre of Australia's biggest coronavirus outbreak, is expected to see daily infections peak next week, authorities said on Monday (Sept 6), as they look to speed up immunisations before easing lockdown rules.
